title: Wearing New Clothes Dua
description: Authentic supplications for Wearing New Clothes Dua
seoContent: Authentic invocations and supplications for Wearing New Clothes Dua. Derived from reliable sources including Hisnul Muslim.

items.title: Dua 6
items.arabic: ( اللَّهُمَّ لَكَ الْحَمْدُ أَنْتَ كَسَوْتَنِيهِ، أَسْأَلُكَ مِنْ خَيْرِهِ وَخَيْرِ مَا صُنِعَ لَهُ، وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَرِّهِ وَشَرِّ مَا صُنِعَ لَهُ).
items.transliteration: Allahumma lakal-hamdu anta kasawtaneeh, as-aluka min khayrihi wakhayri ma suniAAa lah, wa-aAAoothu bika min sharrihi washarri ma suniAAa lah.
items.translation: O Allah, for You is all praise, You have clothed me with it (i.e. the garment), I ask You for the good of it and the good for which it was made, and I seek refuge with You from the evil of it and the evil for which it was made.

description_ar: من الأذكار والأدعية الصحيحة: دعاء لبس الثوب الجديد
